synthesis_conditions.notes: By slightly varying the experimental conditions, three porous POM-based 3D structures were obtained.

synthesis_conditions.thermal_stability_test_result: Weight loss of 21.90 %, corresponding to the removal of TBA organic cations.
synthesis_conditions.hydrolytic_stability_test_conditions: Stirred in common organic solvents (methanol, ethanol, acetonitrile, acetone, chloroform, and DMF) for 10 h at 80 8C
synthesis_conditions.hydrolytic_stability_test_result: No compound dissolution, framework decomposition, or POM leaching observed.

cation_exchange_experiment_conditions.result: Color change from light blue to light purple, CoII uptake of 1 mol per mol of 3.
